title: No Popup Menu in Java Editor Ruler (Photon)
description: When trying to access the popup menu in the Java editor ruler, it does not appear as expected.
OB: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right click on the left vertical ruler. The popup menu, which should include options to add breakpoints/marks, etc., does not appear.
EB: When right clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor, a popup menu with options to add breakpoints/marks, etc. should appear.
SR: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right click on the left vertical ruler. Verify that a popup menu with options to add breakpoints/marks, etc. does not appear.
